sections.title: The Syzygy: Anima and Animus
sections.thesis: The inner pair of opposites and how it shapes relationship to the unconscious and to others.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A paired structure of opposites (often anima and animus) that mediates relation to the unconscious.
The inner feminine figure in a man, shaping feeling-toned relation to the unconscious.
The inner masculine figure in a woman, shaping judgment, meaning-making, and logos orientation.
